21.6. Recurrent Neural Network Models 439
Figure 21.4: Depiction of LSTM RNN for Activity Recognition. Taken from Deep Recurrent
Neural Networks for Human Activity Recognition .
It may be more common to use an LSTM in conjunction with a CNN on HAR problems, in
a CNN-LSTM model or ConvLSTM model. This is where a CNN model is used to extract the
features from a subsequence of raw sample data, and output features from the CNN for each
